timeline.message: Added VSCode resources to .gitignore and apache-rat excludes (#1582)

timeline.bodyText:
Do these exist only at the root of the project, or do they exist throughout the project?
If only at the root, they should be:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            .vscode/
          
          
            
            .factorypath
          
          
            
            /.vscode/
          
          
            
            /.factorypath
          
      
    
    
  

(I assume .factorypath is a regular file; if it's a directory, it should end in a slash also.)
timeline.author: ctubbsii

replies.bodyText: No problem, '.vscode' directory only exists in the directory you open in the IDE, so it could technically be in anywhere, but usually only in the root. The '.factorypath' file can exist within any sub directory.
replies.author: andrewglowacki

replies.bodyText: Okay, the way you have it should be fine, then.
replies.author: ctubbsii
